import Mathlib

/--
Suppose T is self-adjoint, Î» âˆˆ ð•œ, and Îµ > 0. If there exists a unit vector v with
âˆ¥T v - Î» â€¢ vâˆ¥ < Îµ, then T has an eigenvalue Î»' with â€–Î» - Î»'â€– < Îµ.
This is a translation of Axler Ex. 7.14. -/

theorem Axler_exercise_7_14 {ð•œ : Type*} {E : Type*} [RCLike ð•œ] [InnerProductSpace ð•œ E]
  [FiniteDimensional ð•œ E] (T : E â†’â‚—[ð•œ] E) (hT : LinearMap.adjoint T = T)
  {Î» : ð•œ} {Îµ : â„} (hÎµ : 0 < Îµ) :
  (âˆƒ v : E, â€–vâ€– = 1 âˆ§ â€–T v - Î» â€¢ vâ€– < Îµ) â†’
  âˆƒ Î»' : ð•œ, (âˆƒ w : E, w â‰  0 âˆ§ T w = Î»' â€¢ w) âˆ§ â€–Î» - Î»'â€– < Îµ := by

âˆ¥T v - mu â€¢ vâˆ¥ < eps, then T has an eigenvalue mu' with â€–mu - mu'â€– < eps.
This is a translation of Axler Ex. 7.14. -/

import Mathlib

/--
Suppose T is self-adjoint, mu âˆˆ ð•œ, and eps > 0. If there exists a unit vector v with
âˆ¥T v - mu â€¢ vâˆ¥ < eps, then T has an eigenvalue mu' with |mu - mu'| < eps.
This is a translation of Axler Ex. 7.14. -/

theorem Axler_exercise_7_14 {ð•œ : Type _} [IsROrC ð•œ] {E : Type _} [NormedAddCommGroup E]
  [InnerProductSpace ð•œ E] [FiniteDimensional ð•œ E]
  (T : E â†’â‚—[ð•œ] E) (hT : LinearMap.adjoint T = T)
  (mu : ð•œ) (eps : â„) (hÎµ : 0 < eps)
  (h : âˆƒ v : E, â€–vâ€– = 1 âˆ§ â€–T v - mu â€¢ vâ€– < eps) :
  âˆƒ mu' : ð•œ, (âˆƒ w : E, w â‰  0 âˆ§ T w = mu' â€¢ w) âˆ§ (abs (mu - mu') < eps) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

section

variable (ð•œ : Type _) [IsROrC ð•œ]
variable (E : Type _) [NormedAddCommGroup E] [InnerProductSpace ð•œ E] [FiniteDimensional ð•œ E]

/--
Suppose T is self-adjoint, mu âˆˆ ð•œ, and eps > 0. If there exists a unit vector v with
âˆ¥T v - mu â€¢ vâˆ¥ < eps, then T has an eigenvalue mu' with |mu - mu'| < eps.
This is a translation of Axler Ex. 7.14. -/

theorem Axler_exercise_7_14 (T : E â†’â‚—[ð•œ] E) (hT : LinearMap.adjoint T = T)
  (mu : ð•œ) (eps : â„) (hÎµ : 0 < eps)
  (h : âˆƒ v : E, â€–vâ€– = 1 âˆ§ â€–T v - mu â€¢ vâ€– < eps) :
  âˆƒ mu' : ð•œ, (âˆƒ w : E, w â‰  0 âˆ§ T w = mu' â€¢ w) âˆ§ (abs (mu - mu') < eps) := by
  sorry

end

import Mathlib

universes u v

/--
Suppose T is self-adjoint, mu âˆˆ ð•œ, and eps > 0. If there exists a unit vector v with
âˆ¥T v - mu â€¢ vâˆ¥ < eps, then T has an eigenvalue mu' with |mu - mu'| < eps.
This is a translation of Axler Ex. 7.14. -/

theorem Axler_exercise_7_14 {ð•œ : Type u} [IsROrC ð•œ] {E : Type v} [InnerProductSpace ð•œ E]
  [FiniteDimensional ð•œ E] (T : E â†’â‚—[ð•œ] E) (hT : LinearMap.adjoint T = T)
  (mu : ð•œ) (eps : â„) (hÎµ : 0 < eps)
  (h : âˆƒ v : E, â€–vâ€– = 1 âˆ§ â€–T v - mu â€¢ vâ€– < eps) :
  âˆƒ mu' : ð•œ, (âˆƒ w : E, w â‰  0 âˆ§ T w = mu' â€¢ w) âˆ§ abs (mu - mu') < eps := by
  sorry
